song_lyrics: Bṛuhaspati jevāne bhoḷavyā, māyā manmā magrūr, ḍāhyā pīlāyā dāḍhmā;
Chāvī kīdhā charchūr, sevo sāchā Harisantne° 1
Duṣhkṛut dubdhāmā ḍūbiyo, anarath kīdhā apār;
Durmati ḍahāpaṇ ḍoḷato, nathī tanno niradhār... Sevo° 2
Shūkar shvānnā dehmā, nirlajj thāsho narnār;
Kaṭakā anna kere kāraṇe, beṭhu joshe gharbār... Sevo° 3
Bhavdukh ṭaḷvānā bhedmā, sad‍guru maḷtā samajāy;
Devānandno Prabhu dekhsho, janma maraṇ maṭī jāy... Sevo° 4
title: Bṛuhaspati jevāne bhoḷavyā māyā manmā magrūr

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-841: Sadguru Devanand Swami

Category: Prakirna Pad
